titles.title: Home Office Deduction Simplification Act of 2009
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a standard home office deduction in the case of certain uses of the office.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/6/2009--Introduced. Home Office Deduction Simplification Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code allow a taxpayer who uses a residence to conduct a trade or business a standard tax deduction equal to the lesser of $1,500 or the taxpayer's gross trade or business income derived from the business use of such residence. Allows an annual inflation adjustment to the standard deduction amount after 2009.
